${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:SoothrRes.NAME: Soothr Res
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, Schedule 3: Lunch.

${modID}:FrancieRes.NAME: Francie Res
${modID}:FrancieRes.FLAVOR: Best way to start the night.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, Schedule 5: Confession. Replaces Soothr Res

${modID}:AllformCouch.NAME: Allform Couch
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply Fatigue, apply #b%d additional Fatigue.

${modID}:Markoalas.NAME: Markoalas
${modID}:Markoalas.FLAVOR: Subject koala exhibits behavior unusual for his smooth brain species...

${modID}:SplitKeyboard.NAME: Split Keyboard
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 7 cards in a turn, gain 1 Punctual.

${modID}:KaraokeKables.NAME: Karaoke Kables
DESCRIPTIONS: Your first attack each turn deals #b%d additional damage.

${modID}:CatTheoryTextbook.NAME: Cat Theory Textbook
${modID}:CatTheoryTextbook.FLAVOR: Because functional programming wasn't esoteric enough.

${modID}:HungryCamera.NAME: HungryCamera
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever Satiety ends your turn, gain 2 max Satiety for the next turn.

${modID}:Blahaj.NAME: Blahaj
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy falls asleep, gain [E].

${modID}:SteamDeck.NAME: Steam Deck
${modID}:SteamDeck.FLAVOR: Do not disturb, homework in progress.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 3rd turn, Schedule 7: Steam Club.

${modID}:KitchenBlowtorch.NAME: Kitchen Blowtorch
${modID}:KitchenBlowtorch.FLAVOR: Lighting a candle is occasion enough.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Satiety, gain 1 Strength this turn.
